chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall a b c : Z, is_pytha a b c -> Zodd a -> pytha_set_even a b c

Premises:
is_pytha = fun a b c : Z => pos_triple a b c /\ a * a + b * b = c * c : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments is_pytha (_ _ _)%Z_scope
Zodd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zodd _%Z_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
pytha_set_even = fun a b c : Z => exists p q m : Z, a = m * (q * q - p * p) /\ b = 2 * m * (p * q) /\ c = m * (p * p + q * q) /\ m >= 0 /\ cond_pq p q : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments pytha_set_even (_ _ _)%Z_scope
pytha_thm1 : forall a b c : Z, is_pytha a b c -> pytha_set a b c
pytha_thm2 : forall a b c : Z, pytha_set a b c -> is_pytha a b c
pytha_ucirc1 : forall a b c : Z, c > 0 -> is_pytha a b c -> in_ucirc (frac a c) (frac b c)
pytha_ucirc2 : forall a b c : Z, a >= 0 /\ b >= 0 /\ c > 0 -> in_ucirc (frac a c) (frac b c) -> is_pytha a b c
frac_eq : forall a b c d : Z, b <> 0 -> c <> 0 -> frac a (b * c) = frac d c -> a = b * d
divide_mult_l : forall a b c : Z, c <> 0 -> (c * a | c * b) -> (a | b)
relp_frac : forall a b c d : Z, b <> 0 -> d <> 0 -> frac a b = frac c d -> rel_prime c d -> exists m : Z, m <> 0 /\ b = m * d
pos_triple = fun a b c : Z => a >= 0 /\ b >= 0 /\ c >= 0 : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments pos_triple (_ _ _)%Z_scope
Zodd_mult_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a * b)
Zodd_plus_Zeven : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zeven b -> Zodd (a + b)
Zodd_plus_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zeven (a + b)
Zeven_plus_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zeven a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a + b)
Zodd_sum2 : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zeven (a - b)
Zodd_sum1 : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zeven (a + b)
sqr_sub1 : forall a b : Z, 0 <= b -> b <= a -> 0 <= a * a - b * b
sqr_sum3 : forall a b : Z, b > 0 -> a * a + b * b > 0
sqr_sum : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a * a + b * b <> 0
sqr_sum4 : forall a b : Z, a * a + b * b = 0 -> a = 0 /\ b = 0
distinct_parity = fun a b : Z => Zeven a /\ Zodd b \/ Zodd a /\ Zeven b : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments distinct_parity (_ _)%Z_scope
Zodd_sum3 : forall a b : Z, Zodd (a + 2 * b) -> Zodd a
Zis_gcd_minus : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a (- b) d -> Zis_gcd b a d
sqr_sum2 : forall a b : Z, 0 <= a * a + b * b
Zdivide_intro : forall a b q : Z, b = q * a -> (a | b)
rel_prime = fun a b : Z => Zis_gcd a b 1 : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments rel_prime (_ _)%Z_scope
Rdiv_ge_0 : forall a b : R, (a >= 0)%R -> (b > 0)%R -> (a / b >= 0)%R

```coq
intros a b c Hpy Hodd.
assert (Hpos : a >= 0 /\ b >= 0 /\ c >= 0) by (apply pytha_thm1 in Hpy; tauto).
destruct (pytha_thm1 a b c Hpy) as (p & q & m & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & Hpq).
exists p, q, m; split; try assumption.
split; try assumption.
apply rel_prime_sym; apply Hpq.
Qed.```

original: intros a b c Hpy Hodd. assert (Hpos : a >= 0 /\ b >= 0 /\ c >= 0) by (apply pytha_thm1 in Hpy; tauto). destruct (pytha_thm1 a b c Hpy) as (p & q & m & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & Hpq). exists p, q, m; split; try auto. split; try auto. apply rel_prime_sym; apply Hpq.
